discussion.author: barche
discussion.text:
About the guidelines:
* QML seems the most logical name, I have no inspiration for two more letters but I can change it if needed
* The version is 0.6 because the package existed before in the old registry. Also willing to change if required

discussion.author: giordano
discussion.text: I think name and version number are all fine. Ping in three days and I'll merge
